emojis.name: Happy
emojis.prompt: That's great to see! What brought you joy today?

emojis.name: Sad
emojis.prompt: Sadness showed up today. Would you like to share why?

emojis.name: Angry
emojis.prompt: I noticed you're feeling angry today. What triggered this emotion?

emojis.name: Anxious
emojis.prompt: Feeling anxious today — care to share what’s causing it?

emojis.name: Tired
emojis.prompt: You’re feeling tired today. Want to talk about what’s been draining you?

emojis.name: In love
emojis.prompt: Feeling in love today — what made your heart feel full?

emojis.name: Confused
emojis.prompt: Feeling a bit unsure? Want to explore what’s behind it?

emojis.name: Fearful
emojis.prompt: Fear can feel heavy. Would you like to share what’s behind it today?

emojis.name: Confident
emojis.prompt: You’re feeling confident — what gave you that boost today?

emojis.name: Calm
emojis.prompt: Calmness is valuable. What helped you feel at peace today?

emojis.name: Overwhelmed
emojis.prompt: Feeling overwhelmed can be tough. Want to unpack what’s going on?

emojis.name: Grateful
emojis.prompt: Gratitude is beautiful. What are you thankful for today?

emojis.name: Frustrated
emojis.prompt: Frustration showed up today. What’s been bothering you?

emojis.name: Disappointed
emojis.prompt: Disappointment can weigh us down. Want to share what led to it?

emojis.name: Nervous
emojis.prompt: Feeling nervous? Want to talk about what’s making you feel that way?

emojis.name: Reflective
emojis.prompt: You’re feeling reflective today. What’s been on your mind?

emojis.name: Proud
emojis.prompt: Pride can be empowering. What accomplishment are you proud of today?

emojis.name: Unwell
emojis.prompt: You’re not feeling well — would it help to describe how?

emojis.name: Vulnerable
emojis.prompt: Vulnerability takes courage. Want to share what you’re going through?

emojis.name: Excited
emojis.prompt: You’re feeling excited — what’s making today feel special?

logs.prompt: I noticed you're feeling angry today. What triggered this emotion?
logs.description: I am upset with this project
